thama putha/piya/sahodaraya/duwa/amma/samipa gnyathiya/ dirgha kalaya yuddhaye yedisitima nisa kumana mohothaka ho ohu/aya miyayamata ida athi bawata sitha thula athiwana kampanaya ho aththatama ese miyayama ho aabadhitha thathwayata pathwima nisa athiwana duka saha kampanaya hethuwenda, sunami/suli sulan/ganwathura/nayayam/ wani swabhawika wipath walata lakwimen thama pawule ayage jiwitha/langama gnyathinge jiwitha nathiwima siyasin dakime prathipalayak washayen pawa mewani mano wyadhi thathwayan athiwiya haki bawada manowidyagnyayan penwadenawa.
